backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Describes evidence for removing the Play Store Guide UI section, listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files, mainly React components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling active section state and rendering section content within AppShell.
frontend/src/components/kyl/AppShell.tsx: Layout component providing header, navigation, sidebar, and footer around main content.
frontend/src/components/kyl/ContentBlock: Reusable card-styled content block with title and body.
frontend/src/components/kyl/InstallAppBu: PWA install button that triggers install prompt or shows fallback instructions.
frontend/src/components/kyl/KeyFeaturesC: Card component displaying an act title and a list of key features.
frontend/src/components/kyl/nav.ts: Defines navigation section metadata including IDs, labels, and icons.
frontend/src/components/kyl/ScenarioCard: Card presenting a scenario, involved parties, and mediation resolution steps.
Overview page with hero image, intro text, and navigation cards linking to app sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Hook detecting PWA installability and standalone mode, exposing an install prompt handler and install outcome state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables, typography, and base UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/sections/AboutMediationSect: UI section with accordion-based educational content explaining mediation basics and benefits.
frontend/src/sections/LegislativeKnowled: Section rendering tabbed feature lists summarizing key provisions of mediation, civil procedure, and arbitration laws.
frontend/src/sections/PlayStoreChecklist: Empty section file with no content.
frontend/src/sections/ScenariosSection.t: Accordion-based section presenting detailed mediation scenarios with parties, disputes, and step‑by‑step resolutions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color system, extended theme settings, and typography/container-query/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing KYL app metadata, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features with requirements tracking.
